oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General field orders announcing death of General Leonidas Polk
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These field orders announce the death of General Leonidas Polk. Document reads "Comrades! You are called to mourn your first Captain, your oldest companion in arms. Lieut. Genl. Polk fell to-day at the outpost of this Army-the Army he raised and commanded- in all of whose trials he shared- to all of whose victories he contributed." Signed "J.E. Johnston, Genl." Gen. Polk was killed by a shell from the 5th Indiana Battery at Pine Mountain, GA on June 14, 1864.
